5009.name: Unknown
5009.message:
Miiverse functions are unavailable
on this console.

For details, please start Miiverse
5009.short_description: Your console has been banned from Juxtaposition.
5009.long_description:
Your console has been banned from Juxtaposition.

This typically occurs because of a violation of the Code of Conduct, or other offenses on the Network or the Discord server.
5009.short_solution: Launch the Miiverse app, or talk to a moderator in the Discord server.
5009.long_solution: For more information, launch the Miiverse app, or request to speak to a moderator in the [Discord server](https://discord.gg/pretendo).
